meanings.sent1: They interred their beloved pet in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The family decided to inter their grandfather in the family plot.
meanings.sent3: The cat interred its favorite toy under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her childhood were interred deep in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The ancient civilization interred their kings with great ceremony.

meanings.definition: To place in a tomb or grave
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists interred the artifacts carefully to preserve them.
meanings.sent2: It is traditional to inter the deceased facing east.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain interred his treasure on a deserted island.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the past were interred in the ancient tomb.
meanings.sent5: Legends say that the pharaohs were interred with their riches for the afterlife.

meanings.sent1: The magician interred the rabbit in the hat before the show.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper had to inter the injured bird for its own safety.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf interred himself in the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds seemed to inter the sun, casting a shadow over the land.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to inter the suspect in a holding cell until further questioning.

meanings.definition: To put in a temporary place
meanings.sent1: She had to inter her luggage in the hotel lobby before checking in.
meanings.sent2: The librarian asked the student to inter the borrowed books on the return cart.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to inter the dessert in the fridge to set before serving.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to inter the painting in the studio until the exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had to inter the test papers in a folder for grading later.

meanings.definition: To deposit a dead body in a grave or tomb
meanings.sent1: The villagers interred the fallen warrior with honor and respect.
meanings.sent2: It is a solemn duty to inter the deceased according to their beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The ancient tradition was to inter the deceased with their possessions.
meanings.sent4: The priest interred the body while reciting prayers for the departed.
meanings.sent5: The soldiers interred their fallen comrade in a solemn ceremony.
